1.name: House of 1000 Corpses
1.description: Two young couples traveling across the backwoods of Texas searching for urban legends of murder end up as prisoners of a bizarre and sadistic backwater family of serial killers.

2.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
2.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

3.name: Love Actually
3.description: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

4.name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
4.description: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

5.name: Mystic River
5.description: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

6.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
6.description: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

7.name: Oldeuboi
7.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

8.name: The Room
8.description: Johnny is a successful banker who lives happily in a San Francisco townhouse with his fiancée, Lisa. One day, inexplicably, she gets bored with him and decides to seduce his best friend, Mark. From there, nothing will be the same again.

9.name: The Matrix Reloaded
9.description: Following the events of The Matrix (1999), Neo and the rebel leaders estimate they have 72 hours until 250,000 probes discover Zion and destroy it and its inhabitants. Neo must decide how he can save Trinity from a dark fate in his dreams.

10.name: Old School
10.description: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.

11.name: The Dreamers
11.description: A young American studying in Paris in 1968 strikes up a friendship with a French brother and sister. Set against the background of the '68 Paris student riots.

12.name: The School of Rock
12.description: After being kicked out of his rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of an uptight elementary private school, only to try and turn them into a rock band.

13.name: Salinui chueok
13.description: In a small Korean province in 1986, three detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

14.name: Lost in Translation
14.description: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

15.name: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
15.description: A cybernetic warrior from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a 25-year old drifter and his future wife from a most advanced robotic assassin and to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

16.name: Big Fish
16.description: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

17.name: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
17.description: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

18.name: Bad Boys II
18.description: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.

19.name: Finding Nemo
19.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

20.name: The Italian Job
20.description: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

21.name: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
21.description: In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, science fiction, and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.

22.name: Wrong Turn
22.description: Six people find themselves trapped in the woods of West Virginia, hunted down by "cannibalistic mountain men grossly disfigured through generations of in-breeding."

23.name: The Haunted Mansion
23.description: A realtor and his wife and children are summoned to a mansion, which they soon discover is haunted, and while they attempt to escape, he learns an important lesson about the family he has neglected.

24.name: The Matrix Revolutions
24.description: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

25.name: Freddy vs. Jason
25.description: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenage population. Except this time, they're out to get each other, too.

26.name: Monster
26.description: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

27.name: X2
27.description: When anti-mutant Colonel William Stryker kidnaps Professor X and attacks his school, the X-Men must ally with their archenemy Magneto to stop him.

28.name: Cold Mountain
28.description: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

29.name: The Last Samurai
29.description: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

30.name: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
30.description: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days. Andie Anderson covers the "How To" beat for "Composure" magazine and is assigned to write an article on "How to Lose a Guy in 10 days." They meet in a bar shortly after the bet is made.

31.name: Identity
31.description: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain-storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

32.name: Underworld
32.description: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

33.name: Peter Pan
33.description: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

34.name: Hulk
34.description: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

35.name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
35.description: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding loon and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

36.name: Holes
36.description: A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.

37.name: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
37.description: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

38.name: Jeepers Creepers 2
38.description: Set a few days after the original, a championship basketball team's bus is attacked by The Creeper, the winged, flesh-eating terror, on the last day of his 23-day feeding frenzy.

39.name: Haute tension
39.description: Best friends Marie and Alexia decide to spend a quiet weekend at Alexia's parents' secluded farmhouse. But on the night of their arrival, the girls' idyllic getaway turns into an endless night of horror.

40.name: Bruce Almighty
40.description: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

41.name: Anger Management
41.description: Dave Buznik is a businessman who is wrongly sentenced to an anger management program, where he meets an aggressive instructor.

42.name: 2 Fast 2 Furious
42.description: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

43.name: Secondhand Lions
43.description: A coming-of-age story about a shy, young boy sent by his irresponsible mother to spend the summer with his wealthy, eccentric uncles in Texas.

44.name: Scary Movie 3
44.description: Cindy must investigate mysterious crop circles and video tapes, and help the President in preventing an alien invasion.

45.name: The Cat in the Hat
45.description: Two bored children have their lives turned upside down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

46.name: Dogville
46.description: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado town. In exchange, she agrees to work for them. As a search visits the town, she finds out that their support has a price. Yet her dangerous secret is never far away.

47.name: Dreamcatcher
47.description: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

48.name: Freaky Friday
48.description: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

49.name: Daddy Day Care
49.description: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

50.name: Thirteen
50.description: A thirteen-year-old girl's relationship with her mother is put to the test as she discovers drugs, sex, and petty crime in the company of her cool but troubled best friend.
